annotations.description: The Blue Collar cocktail was created at New York City's Milk & Honey in 2008. The story goes that it's creator Michael Madrusan accidentally combined the rec...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Blue Collar

textContent:
2oz Rye Whiskey
.5oz Sweet Vermouth
.25oz Maraschino Liqueur
.25oz Amaro CioCiaro
2 dashes Angostura Bitters
2 Dashes Orange Bitters
Orange Twist

Stir and strain into coupe

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5oc1tELgmM
title: Blue Collar
